title: Need for Speed™ SHIFT
description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".   Feel what it’s really like to race high-end performance cars as Need for Speed™ SHIFT thrusts you into the heart of the action for the true driver’s experience. Immersive and exciting features such as a stunningly realistic first-person cockpit view and an all-new crash mechanic deliver an unrivaled sensation of the speed and exhilaration of racing a car on the edge of control. Whether you’re battling online or playing through your career, build your unique driver profile from moment to moment and from race to race and get rewarded for driving the way you want to drive.

childDownloads.title: Drift in SHIFT Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Taking a lead from world famous drift kings like Vaughn Gittin Jr, Need for Speed SHIFT brings the intensity and beauty of drift racing to life like never before.

childDownloads.title: Driver Film - Andrea Bertolini Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Andrea Bertolini is one of the most fortunate racing drivers in the world as he gets to call the Maserati MC12 his company car. He is currently driving for Vitaphone Racing in the FIA GT Championship.

childDownloads.title: Driver Film – Chris Rado Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Chris Rado talks about his passion for racing. With one of the most distinct cars on the racing circuit, the dual-spoilered Scion tC, Rado has made a name for himself in the Time Attack world setting some of the fastest times on record.

childDownloads.title: Driver Film – Tommy Milner  Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Tommy Milner, driver for the Rahal Letterman Racing team, talks about his experience behind the wheel of the BMW M3 GT2. He offers a great insight into the mind of a racing driver, what it takes to compete and what it takes to win.

childDownloads.title: Driver Film – Vaughn Gittin Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: JR is one of the most famous names in the Drift world and one of the most popular ones. Recently he's been working closely with the Need for Speed SHIFT team to help replicate the true sensation of Drifting in the new game.

childDownloads.title: Exclusive Driver Profile Feature Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: What kind of driver are you?  Find out in Need for Speed SHIFT.  You decide the path you take by the way that you drive, be aggressive and earn a reputation that will strike fear in the hearts of other drivers, drive precisely and cleanly to gain their respect.

childDownloads.title: Exotic Racing Series Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Check out the trailer for the all-new Need for Speed SHIFT Exotic Racing Series featuring seven phenomenal new cars and an amazing new track!

childDownloads.title: Ferrari Racing Series - Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Need For Speed™ SHIFT Ferrari Racing Series sees the long awaited return of the legendary Ferrari marque into a Need For Speed game. Some of the most celebrated Ferrari’s of all time make an appearance, including the FXX, F50, F430 GTC and California. Players will be able to participate in new events designed exclusively for the Ferraris to participate in including hot laps, eliminators, endurance races and a world tour. Completing the perfect Ferrari package are an additional 125 gamerpoints as a reward for undertaking various exciting challenges. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Need for Speed™ SHIFT
childDownloads.description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".   Feel what it’s really like to race high-end performance cars as Need for Speed™ SHIFT thrusts you into the heart of the action for the true driver’s experience. Immersive and exciting features such as a stunningly realistic first-person cockpit view and an all-new crash mechanic deliver an unrivaled sensation of the speed and exhilaration of racing a car on the edge of control. Whether you’re battling online or playing through your career, build your unique driver profile from moment to moment and from race to race and get rewarded for driving the way you want to drive.

childDownloads.title: Need For Speed™ Shift Demo
childDownloads.description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) Need for Speed Shift is an amazingly realistic and visceral racing game that gives you the true driver’s experience delivering real-world physics in authentically recreated race cars on a wide range of challenging race tracks.  Players are thrust into the loud, visceral, intense, athletic experience of racing a car on the edge of control from the driver’s perspective through the combination of perception based G-forces, the hyper reality of the cockpit view, and the brutal experience of a first person crash dynamic. Need for Speed Shift features an accurate, accessible physics-based driving model that allows you to feel every impact, every change of track surface and every last bit of grip as you push yourself to the edge.

childDownloads.title: Need For Speed™ SHIFT Exotic Racing Series
childDownloads.description: The Need For Speed™ SHIFT Exotic Racing Series brings together seven sensational racing machines including the McLaren MP4-12C, GUMPERT apollo and the Mercedes-Benz SLR McLaren Stirling Moss for a host of challenging events set on four beautiful new Riviera circuits. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Need for Speed™ Shift Television Commercial - Video
childDownloads.description: Need For Speed Shift brings the experience of being a race driver to life in a terrifyingly realistic way.  Prepare for the most exciting, visceral and rewarding drive of your life! Need For Speed Shift.  Think Fast. Drive Faster.

childDownloads.title: Need For Speed Shift Theme
childDownloads.description: Need for Speed™ SHIFT is an award-winning authentic racing game that combines the true driver’s experience with real-world physics, pixel-perfect car models, and a wide range of authentic race tracks. Need for Speed SHIFT takes players in a different direction to create a simulation experience that replicates the true feeling of driving high-end performance cars.   There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: NFS SHIFT Ferrari Racing Series
childDownloads.description: Need For Speed™ SHIFT Ferrari Racing Series sees the long awaited return of the legendary Ferrari marque into a Need For Speed game. Some of the most celebrated Ferrari’s of all time make an appearance, including the FXX, F50, F430 GTC and California. Players will be able to participate in new events designed exclusively for the Ferraris to participate in including hot laps, eliminators, endurance races and a world tour. Completing the perfect Ferrari package are an additional 125 gamerpoints as a reward for undertaking various exciting challenges. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: NfS Shift Team Racing
childDownloads.description: In Need For Speed™ Shift Team Racing players must prove they can be a team player as well as a great driver to keep their opponents off the podium. Teams of up to six players compete together against the best teams from around the world to prove they are the best. Team racing wouldn’t be complete without some fan favourite cars to race in, so five new cars make their Need For Speed Shift debut. Please note - the five new cars are available immediately for use online and in quick race, and from tier two in the career.

childDownloads.title: SHIFT Teaser Trailer
childDownloads.description: Download the trailer and get  a first look at the True Driver’s Experience with Need for Speed SHIFT, in stores September 22, 2009.

childDownloads.title: Track Film - Laguna Seca  Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Here’s a look at Laguna Seca with some tips on how to set the best lap times.  The Monterey based track is one of the most famous and exciting in world racing and is home to the infamous corkscrew bend.

childDownloads.title: Track Film - London - Video
childDownloads.description: London is one of the most interesting courses in the game and definitely one of the best for close-contact, top speed racing. Check out this guide to find out how to get the most out of the track. To really enjoy yourself on the course sit behind the wheel of the Aston Martin DB-R or the Maserati MC-12.

childDownloads.title: Track Film - Nurburgring - Video
childDownloads.description: Nordschleife is deservedly the most popular course in the game and the longest clocking in at more than 13km. This is one of the toughest races in the game and one which definitely earns its nickname of "The Green Hell". Watch the video to learn some key tricks to getting through the track in one piece.

childDownloads.title: Track Film - Spa Francochamps - Video
childDownloads.description: Spa is one of the world's classic race courses so when it came to deciding which tracks we wanted in the game Spa was an obvious inclusion. It offers a great combination of incredible straights where you get to really test the top speed of your car and some brutal turns where you'll need all your handling skills to survive intact.

childDownloads.title: Track Film - Willow Springs - Video
childDownloads.description: As one of the oldest courses in the game this is a welcome addition for any gamer looking for a tough but rewarding challenge. Over the years Willow Springs has found a place in the hearts of many motoring enthusiasts so much so that a large group successfully mounted a campaign for the track to be added to the list of Californian Points of Historical Interest in 1996.

childDownloads.title: Welcome to Need for Speed SHIFT  Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Need for Speed SHIFT delivers the true drivers experience, bringing together the excitement and tension of being a racing driver on the edge, think fast, drive faster!
